name: Matt Silvia
bio: In 2018 Matt moved across the country from California to Ridgway. He's a veteran musician with over 30 years experience and recently has been performing with John Butterfuss, Charlie Jacques, Guitar Club, and Muzical Romance. This is his second appearance at the Rendezvous.

name: Christopher Dale
bio: Spawning from San Diego’s premier singer/songwriter venue Java Joe’s with the likes of Jewel and Jason Mraz and described as McCartney & John Mayer meet Neil Young & Tom Petty at a Jimmy Buffet concert, Christopher Dale mixes his many influences together to form one uniquely engaging artist. As a traveling troubadour he captures your attention with his honesty, heart and fun-loving energy as he mixes catchy songwriting, a remarkable vocal range and candid storytelling with an unparalleled devotion to entertain the audience.

name: Ian Unwired
bio: Singer/songwriter Ian Kucenski has played in numerous bands for over a decade now including: Losing Face, Battle Axe, Electric Foreplay, and is currently a solo acoustic project. If you're a fan of various styles of rock music you will want to check out Ian's performance.

name: Western Range
bio: Western Range is a five-piece band of talented and accomplished musicians who perform authentic toe-tapping Texas Swing, Honky Tonk and Rockabilly music.
